mapper.sql: SELECT A.*,aq.time_window , AC.ID, AC.name, to_timestamp(to_char(systimestamp,'yy/mm/dd hh24missff3'),'yy/mm/dd hh24missff3') as systime FROM AUCTION A INNER JOIN AUCTION_DUE_QUE AQ ON ( A.IDX = AQ.AUCTION_IDX ) INNER JOIN ACCOUNT AC ON ( A.WRITTER_IDX=AC.IDX ) WHERE A.STATE_CODE =1 AND AQ.TIME_WINDOW > SYSTIMESTAMP

SELECT rownum rnum, B.* FROM (
AND 1=1
AND title LIKE '%' || #{search } || '%'
ORDER BY time_window ASC ) B ORDER BY rnum
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Auction(writter_idx, time_window_code, start_price, title, content, item_img, highest_bid) VALUES( #{writter_idx}, #{time_window_code}, #{start_price}, #{title}, #{content}, #{item_img}, #{start_price})
INSERT INTO Auction_Inquire(auction_idx, writer_idx, content) VALUES( #{auction_idx}, #{writer_idx }, #{content })
mapper.select: SELECT rownum rnum, AC.id, AC.name, B.* FROM ( SELECT idx, auction_idx, writer_idx, CONTENT, written_time, answer, answer_time FROM auction_inquire WHERE auction_idx = #{idx } ) B INNER JOIN account AC ON ( AC.idx = B.writer_idx) ORDER BY written_time DESC

SELECT e.* FROM( SELECT DISTINCT b.*,ac.title, adq.time_window, acnt.name FROM bid b INNER JOIN bid_alive_que ba ON (b.bidder_idx = ba.bidder_idx) INNER JOIN account acnt ON ( b.bidder_idx = acnt.idx ) INNER JOIN auction ac ON (ac.idx = b.auction_idx) INNER JOIN auction_due_que adq ON (adq.auction_idx = b.auction_idx) WHERE b.auction_idx=#{idx} AND (b.state_code=1 OR b.state_code=2) ORDER BY amount DESC) e WHERE rownum<=5

SELECT DISTINCT b.*,ac.title,bcq.payment_due, greatest( coalesce(adq.time_window,to_timestamp('2000','yyyy')), coalesce(ac.closed_when,to_timestamp('2000','yyyy')), coalesce(ac.finished_when,to_timestamp('2000','yyyy'))) time_window FROM bid b INNER JOIN auction ac ON (ac.idx = b.auction_idx) left JOIN bid_contract_que bcq ON (bcq.auction_idx = b.auction_idx) left JOIN auction_due_que adq ON (adq.auction_idx = b.auction_idx) WHERE (b.state_code=1 OR b.state_code=2 OR b.state_code=3 OR b.state_code=4) AND b.bidder_idx=#{idx} ORDER BY BID_TIME DESC
SELECT ac.*, adq.time_window FROM auction ac INNER JOIN auction_due_que adq ON (adq.auction_idx = ac.idx) WHERE writter_idx = #{writter_idx} ORDER BY time_window

SELECT ac.*,adq.time_window ,acnt.name FROM auction ac INNER JOIN auction_due_que adq ON (adq.auction_idx = ac.idx) INNER JOIN account acnt ON (ac.writter_idx = acnt.idx) WHERE ac.state_code=1 AND rownum<=5 ORDER BY time_window ASC

select AU.*, A.idx acc_idx, A.NAME acc_name,A.THUMB_LOC thumb_loc, BI.BUSINESS_LICENSE_CODE, BI.CORPORATION_NAME,BI.REPRESENTATIVE,BI.BUSINESS_ADDR,BI.BUSINESS_CATEGORY, AQ.TIME_WINDOW from AUCTION AU inner join (select AUCTION_IDX, TIME_WINDOW, ROWNUM R from AUCTION_DUE_QUE order by TIME_WINDOW asc) AQ on AU.IDX = AQ.AUCTION_IDX inner join ACCOUNT A on AU.WRITTER_IDX = A.IDX inner join BUSINESS_INFO BI on A.IDX = BI.ACC_IDX where AQ.R between 1 and 5 order by AQ.TIME_WINDOW asc
